name: Elizabeth Waugh-Duford
what_you_do: Elizabeth helps people make safe choices in cosmetics and skin care, with Beautycounter products that won't harm you, your family, or the earth.
who_you_serve: Elizabeth serves primarily low-income women and children, and unhoused individuals and families.
audience_type: B2C, low-income women and children, unhoused individuals and families
business_focus: Helping people make safe choices in cosmetics and skin care with Beautycounter products.
